Wind Chill Calculator

A simple weather tool that shows how cold it actually feels.

Wind Chill Formula:

WC = 13.12 + 0.6215T − 11.37V0.16 + 0.3965T V0.16

where T is temperature (°C) and V is wind speed (km/h)

This formula is used by meteorological services to estimate how cold the weather feels on exposed skin.
